description:
This talk takes a look at the approaches and learnings from a first-time experience of developing a system entirely around micro-services. This project had many challenges, including a distributed team, many of whom were working together for the first time, an aggressive deadline and a rapidly changing business model. This talk will explore how micro-services can assist in such a challenging environment, and examine the tools chosen and the processes used to deliver a successful software project."

About the speaker: "Rory is a former start-up co-founder and DevOps evangelist with a passion for high scalability, RESTful architecture, NoSQL solutions and cloud-based services.
Rory’s overriding mission in his professional life is to erase the traditional dividing line between Development and Operations in software companies. He strives to help create environments where cross-disciplinary teams are singularly focused on bringing maximum value to customers. And he sometimes sings opera."
title: Do Microservices Deliver
